pullRequest.title: Create StoredTabletFile to use in different situations
pullRequest.bodyText:
Created methods for read/insert/updateDel and have them called
throughout the code for the appropriate situation
Throw exception if we try to get metadata for update or delete and one
does not exist
Call inserted() method on TabletFile to update metadata entry when a
file is new and inserted
Drop FileUtil.toPathStrings() and use object collections instead
Replace String path with TabletFile in FileUtil

nodes.bodyText: Should resolve this before merge, or create follow-on task.

It would be nice to keep this object immutable.  Could possibly have this method return a new object instead of mutating itself, but I am not sure if that is easy to do.  If my suggestion is really cumbersome to implement, please ignore this comment.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * Return a string for reading the tablet file. Doesn't have to be exact string in metadata.
          
          
            
               * Return a string for opening and reading the tablet file. Doesn't have to be exact string in metadata.
The javadoc comment say its does not have to be the exact path in meta, but the method name has Meta in it.  I feel like Meta should be dropped from the name.

This seems to be protecting against programming errors, where the TabletFile on which this method is being called was not constructed from a metadata entry. However, a better way to protect against these kinds of programming errors is to put this method on a subclass. So, by the type hierarchy, you enforce the fact that this method can only ever be called on a subclass, which is a type where construction requires a metadata entry.

commit.message:
Update TabletFile to use getters for different situations

* Created methods for read/insert/updateDel and have them called
throughout the code for the appropriate situation
* Throw exception if we try to get metadata for update or delete and one
does not exist
* Call inserted() method on TabletFile to update metadata entry when a
file is new and inserted
* Drop FileUtil.toPathStrings() and use object collections instead
* Replace String path with TabletFile in FileUtil

Apply suggestions from code review

Co-Authored-By: Keith Turner <kturner@apache.org>

Create StoredTabletFile

* New class that extends TabletFile for situations where we need to
update or delete a TabletFile or read it directly from metadata

nodes.bodyText: It looks like these can all be lambdas, but that can be a follow-on issue.
If you wanted to, you could use var keyword 😺

commit.message: Fix for minC - prevent checking map when the file is empty
